info.name: SmartFreeTimeUtilizer
info.description:
StartFragment

**Smart Free Time Utilizer** is a web-based application designed to help users make productive use of their free time through **personalized micro-learning recommendations**. The system collects user details such as age, interests, available time, and learning context, and uses **AI-powered content generation** to suggest small, structured learning tasks.

The application intelligently considers the userâ€™s **previous learning history** to avoid repetition and ensure continuity in learning. Each recommendation is broken into clear micro-tasks with titles, detailed explanations, and practical tips, making it easy for users to learn effectively within short time periods.

The backend is built using **Flask and MySQL**, handling user authentication, history management, and AI integration, while the frontend provides a simple and interactive user experience. This project demonstrates the use of **AI, RESTful APIs, and database-driven personalization** to promote smart and efficient learning.

EndFragment
